name: TechFacts

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tech facts
des: This is a trivia-based skill which provides the user with interesting and mind-blowing facts about technology. It gives random facts of tech gadgets, IT companies, new technologies emerging and some unknown truths about this darker world of machines.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
